name: Pixil Platformer
description:
Welcome to the Binary Void!

In Pixil Platformer, you join our friend Pixil on a journey back home. There's so much you can do such as:

- Encounter Silly Characters

- Collect Pixels, Computer Chips, and more!

- Find several easter eggs scattered across the Binary Void

- and more!

In this version of the game, your challenge is to reach the end by collecting Floppy Discs that allow you to progress further. Don't just follow this specific path, though, as there's so much more to do! 

There are 2 abilities to collect: the Dash Jump and the Super Jump, which will aid you in platforming! 

There is also a secret temple, brought into the void through a mysterious rift...explore the Temple of El-Orin and uncover the secrets that lie in this temple, but watch out...you're being watched...

Finally, before you begin your adventure, beware. This is a game meant to be beaten in one session. There is no save system at the moment for how short the game is, and be aware, that if you lose ALL YOUR LIVES...well...let's just say you don't want that to happen...

Have fun, and stay tuned for the next update!
